markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Barkeep](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=412)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 84 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You have five specialties: hefting barrels, drinking, polishing steins, drinking, and drinking. You worked in a bar, where you learned how to hold your liquor and rowdily socialize.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill, and the [Alcohol Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Hobnobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=791) skill feat.
name: Barkeep

text: Barkeep Source Player Core pg. 84 2.0 You have five specialties: hefting barrels, drinking, polishing steins, drinking, and drinking. You worked in a bar, where you learned how to hold your liquor and rowdily socialize. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Diplomacy skill, and the Alcohol Lore skill. You gain the Hobnobber skill feat.
